com.abdulrhmanil.wallhavenwallpapers.fragments.interactions

Interface OnPressLocalPhoto

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DownloadedFragment
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface OnPressLocalPhoto
    Notice: this interface interaction is very important because it's show a ScrollZoomedPhotosFragment fragment, that show the photo in fullscreen with zooming option while communicate with DownloadedFragment fragment (via MainActivity) to sync the position of the recycler view when scroll the fullscreen photos. We defined a number of interaction with the UI: Functional interface that determine response to one interaction with the UI interface. This interface is responsible on pressing local photo (the image it's self), the response for that interact is show the local photo in fullscreen mode. While we show the fullscreen mode we give the option to scroll between photos and zoom them.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void startScrollZoomedPhotosFragment(int startPosition)
      When press a local photo, we show that photo in fullscreen mode with zoom option, and you can scroll between the zoomed photos while keep the scrolling synced between the to lists (recyclers view).

    • Method Detail

      • startScrollZoomedPhotosFragment

        void startScrollZoomedPhotosFragment(int startPosition)
        When press a local photo, we show that photo in fullscreen mode with zoom option, and you can scroll between the zoomed photos while keep the scrolling synced between the to lists (recyclers view).

        The operation done in steps, after pressing on the local photo : 1 - firstly we show the scroll zoomed photos fragment to show the photos in fullscreen mode 2 - secondly we move the recycler view to position of the pressed photo, so show the pressed photo in the fullscreen mode. 3 - while the user scroll between the fullscreen photos in ScrollZoomedPhotosFragment you notify listener that the scroll position changed, in his turn communicate with the Main Activity that the scroll position changed, so the Main Activity communicate with DownloadedFragment so the DownloadedFragment can sync the scroll position, so when the user back to the DownloadedFragment, will see where he stop. To keep the UI so friendly.

        Parameters:
        startPosition - is the position of the pressed local photo, we need it to move the recycler view to that position, to show the user the same photo he pressed in fullscreen mode. this position is the initialization index.
